home.title: Eats OK
home.subtitle: Monitor your scanned products and receive real-time recall alerts.
home.emptyState: Scan your first product to track its recall status.

scan.barcodeInstruction: Scan the product barcode to automatically identify the brand.
scan.lotInstruction: Clearly frame the lot number and capture the photo.
scan.privacyInfo: Photos are processed locally only and deleted immediately. No images are stored.

errors.lotExtractFailed: Unable to extract lot number automatically.
errors.brandFirst: Capture the brand before the lot number.
errors.barcodeNotFound: Barcode not recognized. Try scanning the brand text.
errors.barcodeScanFailed: Barcode scan failed. Try scanning the brand text.

manualEntry.title: Manual entry
manualEntry.subtitle: Add a product by entering its lot number and brand.

errors.lotRequiredMessage: Please enter a lot number to continue.
errors.checkFailed: Unable to check recalls at the moment.

details.title: Product details
details.privacyInfo: Photos taken during scanning are processed locally and immediately deleted. Only the brand and lot number are kept on this device.

history.title: History
history.subtitle: Filter your scans by recall status.
history.emptyStateDetailed: No data yet. Start a scan to fill your history.

productCard.privacy: No photos are stored; only the brand and lot number are kept.

recallAlert.title: CONTAMINATED PRODUCT
recallAlert.warning: This product is subject to an official recall and must not be consumed.
recallAlert.emergencyText: If you have consumed this product and experience symptoms, contact emergency services immediately.
recallAlert.returnForRefund: Return the product to the store for a refund

language.title: Settings
language.subtitle: Choose your preferred language for the app.

alert.title: üö® CONTAMINATED PRODUCT ALERT

welcomeScreen.question: What product would you like to check today?
welcomeScreen.namePromptMessage: To personalize your experience, please enter your first name:
